requirements.summary: Deploy the current application state to the Internet Computer network
acceptanceCriteria: The backend canister (backend/main.mo) compiles without errors
Both canisters are deployed to the Internet Computer network
The deployed application is accessible via its canister URL
No deployment errors or technical snafus occur

file_operations.description: Verify and update deployment checklist to ensure all pre-deployment steps are documented and current. Confirm build verification steps match the actual build process for the GTA Online Horse Track Guesser application.

Verify HTML entry point integrity including PWA manifest links, app icons at frontend/public/assets/generated/app-icon.dim_512x512.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/app-icon-maskable.dim_512x512.png, theme colors, and viewport configuration are correct for deployment.

Verify PWA manifest references to generated icon assets at /assets/generated/app-icon.dim_512x512.png and /assets/generated/app-icon-maskable.dim_512x512.png are correct and match the actual asset paths for deployment.
Verify application entry point configuration including React Query setup, Internet Identity provider initialization, and root component mounting to ensure clean deployment without runtime errors.
